```{r, echo=FALSE}
text_tbl <- data.frame(
  Subject = c("Supply chain and its latest trend", "Programming tools", "Project in Data Analytics"),
  Features = c(
    " Monday 2pm-6pm ",
    "Tuesday 8am-12am", 
    "Friday 8am-12am"
  )
)

kable(text_tbl) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = F) %>%
  column_spec(1, bold = T, border_right = T) %>%
  column_spec(2, border_left = T, background = "lightblue")
```
